author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33880 in which a unit test for the AlCaHarvesting / PCLMetadataWriter was adeed.
The BeamSpot workflows are added to the test and some more refinements to the configuration are added.

#### PR validation:

Run the modified unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport is needed.
title: add BeamSpot workflows to Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducers unit test
